tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "EA7674C5402CAEDF21235BBE30BF85B0", "You just received a Crafting Recipe. Use this item from your inventory to learn a recipe and craft it at crafting stations. However, keep in mind that some advanced recipes require higher-level stations.")
